Tools

Useful interactive tools and resources to help you in your professional journey.

How to Use These Tools

These tools are standalone web applications that you can use directly in your browser. Simply click on any tool card above to access it. No installation or login required.

All tools run entirely in your browser and don't send any data to external servers... they're more for me, but I'm happy to share.
